article.headline: Coastal Carolina 85, Charleston Southern 78
article.story: CONWAY, S.C. (AP) -- Jack Leasure scored 23 points to lead Coastal Carolina past the Charleston Southern 85-78 on Saturday. Mario Sisinni scored eight of his 16 points in overtime for the Chanticleers (10-10, 3-4 Big South), who outscored the Buccaneers 18-11 in the extra session to snap a three-game losing streak. Sisinni hit a 3-pointer 20 seconds into overtime to give Coastal Carolina a 70-67 lead and put the Chanticleers in the lead for good. Logan Johnson had 15 points, David Long scored 12 and Phil Wallace finished with 11 for Coastal Carolina. Steven Sexton had just five points for the Chanticleers, but it was his 3-pointer as time expired in regulation that sent the game into overtime. Chris Moore scored 22 points and hit five 3-pointers, Omar Carter finished with 20 on 8-of-18 shooting and Jamarco Warren had 16 points but was just 5-of-21 from the field and 3-of-11 from 3-point range for Charleston Southern (7-15, 1-6).

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
